body: I want to do this get the hottest schoolgirl from a highschool and fuck her in front of her classmates.
Aye Gym Teacher, I'm  Gonna John Wicking You to Death

Can this trully be considered as NTR if she wasn't even in a relationship with anybody, let alone even hinted who she truly likes? This is all on the assumption that she still likes the MC like in canon-verse. Hell, if that guy on pg 31, first panel, who says "... Whatever" was the MC, then apparently she doesn't even matter to him. After all, you can't steal something that was not wanted or owned.
